script.name: plugin.boarding.tele
script.sourceplaintext:
* Boarding Transporter * ========================================= * Author: Cycrow * Created: 30-11-2009 * ========================================= * V2 - Changes to new emp ware * ========================================= * V100 - Adjusted for Guilds Mod * ========================================= $page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $SHIP = [PLAYERSHIP]
* check we have the corect upgprades if not $SHIP -> get true amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay START speak text: page=13 id=24 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3001, Transporter Device, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null else if not $SHIP -> get true amount of ware Boarding Transporter Extension in cargo bay START speak text: page=13 id=24 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3001, Boarding Transporter Extension, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
* check we have some marines $aMarines = $SHIP -> get marines array if not size of array $aMarines START speak text: page=13 id=610 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3005, null, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
* check for valid target $aim = get player tracking aim if not $aim -> exists START speak text: page=13 id=4 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3002, null, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
$owner = $aim -> get true owner if $owner == Player START speak text: page=13 id=4 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3006, null, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
if not $aim -> is ship boardable START speak text: page=13 id=611 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3003, $aim, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
* we must be within 1km for the device to work $ship.size = $SHIP -> get size of object $aim.size = $aim -> get size of object $max.dist = $ship.size + $aim.size + 500 $dist = get distance between $SHIP and $aim if $dist > $max.dist START speak text: page=13 id=609 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3004, 1, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
* shields are still up $threshold = $aim -> get boarding shield threshold $shield = $aim -> get shield percent if $shield > $threshold START speak text: page=13 id=607 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3007, $aim, $threshold, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=3000 ms return null end
* lets start the boarding proces START speak text: page=13 id=1307 priority=10
* compute the boarding speed based on the top 3 mechanical marines * first take the top 3 mechanical marines $marinesNeeded = $aim -> get number of marines can board @ $aMarines = [THIS] -> call script lib.cycrow.sortmarines : Marines=$aMarines Overall, Mech, Hack, Fight, Eng='mech'
$aTakeMarines = array alloc: size=0
$mechanical = 0
$add = 3 while $add skip if size of array $aMarines break $m = $aMarines[0] $mech = $m -> get marine mechanical skill $mechanical = $mechanical + $mech append $m to array $aTakeMarines remove element from array $aMarines at index 0 dec $marinesNeeded = dec $add = end
* next take the 2 top hackers $aMarines = $SHIP -> get marines array @ $aMarines = [THIS] -> call script lib.cycrow.sortmarines : Marines=$aMarines Overall, Mech, Hack, Fight, Eng='hack'
$add = 2 while $add skip if size of array $aMarines break $m = $aMarines[0] if not find $m in array: $aTakeMarines append $m to array $aTakeMarines dec $marinesNeeded = end remove element from array $aMarines at index 0 dec $add = end
* now take the remaining in order of fighting $aMarines = $SHIP -> get marines array @ $aMarines = [THIS] -> call script lib.cycrow.sortmarines : Marines=$aMarines Overall, Mech, Hack, Fight, Eng='fight' while $marinesNeeded skip if size of array $aMarines break $m = $aMarines[0] if not find $m in array: $aTakeMarines append $m to array $aTakeMarines dec $marinesNeeded = end remove element from array $aMarines at index 0 end
* lets start the proces @ = wait 1500 ms $done = 0
$threshold = $aim -> get boarding shield threshold $threshold = $threshold * 2 $increase = 400 skip if $aim -> get true amount of ware Hull Polarising Device in cargo bay $increase = 600
$decrease = 0 while $done < 100 @ = wait 200 ms
skip if $aim -> exists break skip if $aim -> has same environment as $SHIP break
$dist = get distance between $SHIP and $aim $shield = $aim -> get shield percent
if $dist > 1000 $displayMsg = 3009 inc $decrease = if $decrease > 4 $decrease = 0 dec $done = end else if $shield > $threshold $displayMsg = 3010 inc $decrease = if $decrease > 4 $decrease = 0 dec $done = end else $displayMsg = 3008 $decrease = 0 $increase = $increase - $mechanical if $increase <= 0 $increase = 600 + $increase inc $done = end end
$displayDone = $done skip if $displayDone >= 0 $displayDone = 0 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=$displayMsg, $aim, $displayDone, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=2000 ms
skip if $done > -15 break end
* boarded if $done >= 100 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3011, $aim, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=2000 ms $count = size of array $aTakeMarines while $count dec $count = $m = $aTakeMarines[$count] $ret = $aim -> add marine $m to attack group on ship end
* failed else START speak text: page=13 id=604 priority=10 $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3012, $aim, null, null, null, null display subtitle text: text=$text duration=2000 ms $count = size of array $aTakeMarines while $count dec $count = $m = $aTakeMarines[$count] $m ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end end
return null

check we have the corect upgprades
we must be within 1km for the device to work
compute the boarding speed based on the top 3 mechanical marines
